com.ignaciosandoval.utils.security

Class EncryptUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ignaciosandoval.utils.security.EncryptUtil

  • public class EncryptUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to encrypt and decrypt a text or file using the Advanced Encryption Standard algorithm with the Galois/Counter Mode and No Padding (AES/GCM/NoPadding).

    The Key is being generated using the Password-based-Key-Derivative-Function with Keyed-Hash Message Authentication Code and Secure Hash Algorithm 1 (PBKDF2WithHmacSHA1).

    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    iasandoval

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This method will use the encrypted/decrypted data (bytes[]) to convert it to a String representation. For Encrypted data, will encode the data to Base64. For Decrypted data, will encode the data in UTF-8.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A String representation of the encrypted data (bytes[]).
